heading: Content Block 1
summary: Offer supportDo you want to help with food, products, clothing, transportation, or you want to volunteer to help the vulnerable people coming to Romania?I want to help

heading: Content Block 2
summary: HealthIf you need specialized medical assistance, you suffer from a rare or chronic condition, find out here where you can ask for help.Ask for help

heading: Content Block 3
summary: HousingDo you need support in finding temporary accommodation or do you want to provide a space to help vulnerable people who are now coming to Romania. Access Un Acoperiș!Ask for housing

heading: Content Block 4
summary: JobsLooking for a job? Find out how and where you can find job opportunities suitable for you.Find out more

heading: Content Block 5
summary: EducationRights to education in Romania for Ukrainians. Information on how to enroll children in school, kindergarten or extracurricular activities. Ukrainian schools in Romania.Find more

heading: Content Block 6
summary: Call-centerDepending on your needs, call one of the available specialized call-centers. This way you will be granted access to resources, information and dedicated support, no matter what issues you are trying to solve.Call-center

heading: Content Block 7
summary: Legal helpPro bono legal help for Ukrainian refugees in Romania and other countries.Ask for help

heading: Content Block 8
summary: TransportIf you need transportation or technical assistance for your vehicle in an emergency situation find out here how you can get help.Search for transport

heading: Content Block 9
summary: Language courses and activitiesList of free language courses and activities for Ukrainian refugees in Romania. For children and adults.Find out more

heading: Content Block 10
summary: Support for drug usersIf you have used drugs and now you need help, look for services that you can access.Ask for help

heading: Content Block 11
summary: Mental health services for refugees from UkraineIf you need to talk openly about the trauma of war and how you can more easily manage the effects on your well-being and mental health, find out where you can get support.Seek support

heading: Content Block 12
summary: Map of organizations helping refugees from UkraineUsing the online map created by UNHCR, you can find a list of organizations that provide various kinds of assistance to refugees from Ukraine.Map online

heading: Content Block 13
summary: Integration of refugees from Ukraine to RomaniaLearn more about the process of integrating refugees from Ukraine into Romania.More

heading: Content Block 14
summary: Sprijin de UrgențăDo you need any resources, food, products, clothing, tents, transportation or volunteers or do you want to offer any of the above on Sprijin de Urgență?Request or provide resources
